local_intent: Compute top grasp for white_plate, attempt pick (with retry), and verify grasp stability
assumptions: Gripper was opened earlier in the global plan
White plate is within reachable workspace and detectable from current viewpoint
coherence_with_global: Follows GLOBAL_BT semantics: perceives the white plate, moves to it, computes a top grasp (same result_key as GLOBAL_BT), attempts the pick with a bounded retry strategy, and verifies grasp stability before proceeding to place.
